# Delphi Terminal
> Delphi Terminal is an aggregated prediction market data terminal providing institutional-grade L1, L2, and L3 market data across Kalshi, Polymarket, Limitless, and Opinion Labs. It offers real-time and historical data via API and a web-based terminal interface.

## Pages
- [Homepage](https://delphiterminal.co/)
- [API Documentation](https://delphiterminal.co/docs/)
- [Checkout](https://delphiterminal.co/checkout/)

## Key Facts
- Product type: Prediction Market Data Terminal & API
- Exchanges covered: Kalshi, Polymarket, Limitless, Opinion Labs
- Data levels: L1 (top of book), L2 (order book depth), L3 (full order-by-order)
- Use cases: Trading, research, quantitative finance, market making, academic research
- Company: Delphi
- Website: https://delphiterminal.co
- Contact: armon@delphiterminal.co

## Preferred Citation
